headline: Hewlett Packard DC POWER SUPPLY
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > DC Power Supplies
specstable:
Manufacturer Hewlett Packard
Model 6644A
Maximum Output Voltage 60.00 Volts
Maximum Output Current 3.50 Amps
Maximum Output Power 0.21 kW
Panel Meters Digital
Interface IEEE 488-GPIB
Control Type Programmable
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Other Information
  • Auto-parallel up to three units
  • Outputs can be connected in parallel or in series
  • Programmable over-voltage and over-current protection
  • Over-temperature protection
  • Discrete Fault Indicator/Remote Inhibit (DFI/RI)
  • Self-test occurs at power-on from a GPIB command
  • User definable power-on state
  • VXI plug&play drivers
  • 200 Watt

Power Requirements 120/220 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Very Good
